results.title: Prevention of salt induced hypertension and fibrosis by angiotensin converting enzyme inhibitors in Dahl S rats.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_trandolapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:C052035 @@@Trandolapril@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ prevented 50% of the increase in BP in light and dark period of the day.
